price: nítorí kí wọ́n lè ṣàì moore sí n̄ǹkan tí A fún wọn. Nítorí náà, ẹ máa gbádùn ǹsó. Láìpẹ́ ẹ máa mọ̀.
arabic: لِيَكۡفُرُواْ بِمَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡۚ فَتَمَتَّعُواْ فَسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: liyakfurū bimā ātaynāhum fatamattaʿū fasawfa taʿlamūna
